author: draganrakita
content: I do support `eip/70`, it seems logical thing to do, what i wanted to say is we dont need a activation date for it.

author: pipermerriam
content:
This seems correct. Not needing a specific activation for it. 

Inversely, I think what this is is the date in which clients are allowed to stop supporting the previous versions... which according to the decision will default to being may 1st, 2025
